page.title: 19Changes in the area
page.content:
In order to discover some of the significant changes in the area over the last fifty years, six local inhabitants were interviewed. They were a Church of England clergyman, a butcher, a publican, an accountant (all elderly) and a young housewife.
Population Greatly increased with many young couples commuting by car to neighbouring towns to work.
Environment Many new homes and the construction of the M5 motorway and northern link road have changed a rural area into an urban group living in a rural environment.
